title: I didn't receive my ip and just a half of lp
body: So I've played ranked game today and I was just not able to receive any IPs, and just a half of lp. I should have receive 113 ip and 25lp but ive just got 12 lp and none of ip. I think this is because of the server lag. What should I do now?

replies.body: Can you provide me a link to the exact match this happened in so I can take a look?

http://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/2883281227/209348665?tab=overview

In this game I hadn't receive any of my IP, and just half of my LP.

Half of your LP may have been caused by *Loss Prevented* being enabled during the match you played. The missing IP was caused by a technical error on our side that has since been resolved. You should see a credit for the IP you missed during those matches.

Let me know if you have any other issues.
